DESCRIPTION: Gain an orb slot then channel the listed orb.
Orb. Passive : Deals damage to a random enemy when activated by a cards effect. Evokes after activating #b4 times. Evoke : Deal damage to a random enemy
Orb. Passive : Draw a card when activated by a cards effect. Evokes after activating #b4 times. Evoke : Draw a card
When you play this card activate the passive effect of all your orbs.
